title: Watch: Ukrainian soldier thought to be dead calls his family
summary_full: Nazar Daletskyi's relatives were told he had been killed in 2022, the first year of Russia’s full-scale invasion.
summary_public: Nazar Daletskyi's relatives were told he had been killed in 2022, the first year of Russia’s full-scale invasion.

UA.label: neutral
UA.evidence: thought to be dead calls his family
